steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dqkqc","text":"PBS-2% FCS: Thaw an aliquot of filtered FCS and prepare a solution of 2% FCS (vol/vol) in 1x PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"feqav","text":"33.75% Percoll gradient: Prepare an isotonic solution of 33.75% Percoll using 10x PBS and 1x PBS-2% FCS. Prepare this solution fresh and store at  and protect from light.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":145,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6g9ct","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a65fk","text":"1x Debris removal solution: Prepare a 1:2 dilution of Debris removal solution in cold 1x PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"abjii","text":"Trypan blue: Filter Trypan blue solution using a 100 µm cell strainer and dilute 1:2 in William’s E medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f2d7h","text":"MACS buffer: MACS buffer is a solution containing PBS pH 7.2, 0.5% BSA and 2 mM EDTA. Prepare this by diluting 10% BSA solution 1:20 and 0.5M EDTA 1:250 with 1x PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"clcjb","text":"PBS-0.04% BSA: PBS-0.04% BSA solution is prepared by diluting 10% BSA solution 1:250 in 1x PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3fqop","text":"Culture medium: Add   of FCS to   of RPMI1640 with L-Glutamine.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":32,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ae690","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

Set the acceleration at 9 and brake at 5.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":56,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"50","duration":300,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"A456D89FF28B11EE94490A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"abdsm","text":"After centrifugation, a big brown pellet should be visible which contains most hepatocytes. Take as much of the supernatant as possible without disturbing the hepatocytes (proceed to Section I.A). The supernatant contains the NPC; transfer it to a new 15 mL tube (proceed to Section I.B).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"avuqf","text":"Resuspend the hepatocyte pellet in   of William’s E medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":35,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"CD6D865DF28B11EE94490A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b0bkd","text":"Remove the floating debris and hepatocytes carefully with a pipet without disturbing the pellet. Remove as much of the supernatant as possible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dkklt","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"al485","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"buvgk","text":"The type of downstream assay will determine the following steps.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"B232144AFC9642DDA8FED5BD7A6F9739"}}}}
